goals: Rename user-facing system branding from PelangiManager to digiman
Keep runtime compatibility for existing PELANGI_* environment variables
Avoid breaking MCP tool IDs that external automations may depend on

userStories.title: As an admin, I see digiman branding in web and PWA surfaces
acceptanceCriteria: App title and manifest use digiman
Service worker push fallback uses digiman

userStories.title: As an operator, health and MCP server metadata identify as digiman
As a deployer, I can migrate env vars safely
acceptanceCriteria: Legacy PELANGI_API_URL and PELANGI_API_TOKEN still work
DIGIMAN_MANAGER_HOST and legacy PELANGI_MANAGER_HOST are both supported

userStories.title: As a maintainer, docs reflect digiman naming
acceptanceCriteria: Top-level and module READMEs use digiman branding
RainbowAI env docs point to DIGIMAN_* vars and mention legacy fallback

userStories.title: As an integration owner, existing MCP tool names remain stable
acceptanceCriteria: pelangi_* MCP tool IDs are not renamed in this change set
